HOME_PAGE_TITLE: Travel freely, share a ride with SHTOP!
YOU_PICK_OF_RIDES_AT_LOW_PRICES: You pick of rides at low prices
NO_MATTER_WHERE_YOURE_GOING: No matter where you’re going, by bus or carpool, find the perfect ride from our wide range of destinations and routes at low prices.
WE_TAKE_TIME: We take the time to get to know each of our members and bus partners. We check reviews, profiles and IDs, so you know who you’re travelling with and can book your ride at ease on our secure platform.
BOOKING_A_RIDE_HAS_NEVER: Booking a ride has never been easier! Thanks to our simple app powered by great technology, you can book a ride close to you in just minutes.
AI_TEXT: Discover smarter carpooling with AI! Effortlessly find the best routes and matches for your commute. Save time, reduce emissions, and enjoy the ride. Join us now!
WELCOME-BACK: Welcome back! Select method to log in:
